wikipedia_page.main: Sir Andrew Foster (born 29 December 1944) is a British public servant who was knighted in 2001 for his services to the health and government services.

response: * 357007 – Sir Andrew Foster (the long service non-Executive Director of National Express)

Previous incumbents include Eugene Sullivan, Steve Bundred (later of Monitor), Sir John Banham (later of the CBI), Sir Howard Davies (later of the CBI), Bank of England, FSA (Financial Services Authority) and LSE (London School of Economics), and Sir Andrew Foster.
* Sir Andrew Foster (born 1944), British public servant
* Rube Foster (Andrew Foster, 1879–1930), American baseball player, manager, and executive
* Andrew Foster (educator) (1925–1987), missionary to the deaf in Africa
* Sir Andrew Foster (British public servant) (born 1944), British civil servant
